snippet: Didier Lévy, a Frenchman who has retired to Guadeloupe, has developed software that easily puts bridge articles into an interactive form.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column describes software that can easily put bridge articles into an interactive form; offers deal that can played through Web site vubridge.com.
lead_paragraph: Didier Lévy, a Frenchman who has retired to Guadeloupe, has developed software that easily puts bridge articles into an interactive form.
